title: Where are my Gemstones?
body: I bought the new Augment + Bundle for 2950 RP today, I never got  my 10 gemstones that it says it comes with. (I was told it gives you the gemstones right at the start) After opening the chests and relogging. I still havent gotten my gemstones. I haven't spent them either, I dont own Hextech Annie or Soulstealer Vayne, or even the ward. Help.

replies.body: The bundles marked with +10 denotes 10 chests, not 10 gemstones.  They can, however, provide one gemstone per day until August 7th.  This information is also made available in our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4) guide.  I hope that helps!
